Overview
========

This package provides a page-level rendering system for the
``repoze.bfg`` web framework.

It uses familiar technologies like HTML and CSS to dynamically use an
existing HTML document as template.

Consult the documentation for ``chameleon.html`` for information on
how to write templates.
